Articles.Content:
I am designing a craft that resembles the Buran/American space shuttle, it works very good until 22km, then it spins out of control, I\'m trying various designs and tweaks and invite you to modify and tweak it yourselves. Good luck

Pics: http://imgur.com/MxMkQ,Ichth,mNB7l,AhDuw,tpscp#

we will also need screenshots.

I second that.

I also want screenshots, however for once I downloaded without them to check it out.

The two problems I see..or three, but I\'m being nit-picky.

1. No landing gear.

2. The tower bit that is sorta on top of the main tank...

3. The rocket holder holding the plane portion.

As far as your issues on control at high altitude, I don\'t have any specific tips, but just try various forms of flying and I\'ve had the same troubles, flying in atmo is a different balance than out of atmo. I had a similar design once that worked well and then suddenly did flips until it spun itself apart. xD
